title: TRADED ..... WTT: Corrected Joe Doyle Hands Above Head, Tolstoi
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: TRADED ..... WTT: Corrected Joe Doyle Hands Above Head, Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
TRADED

Bump to revise Trade Want List.  I have $340 in the card, previous sale of a PSA-2 Tolstoi was in March of 2014 at a $291 Auction final price (that card has a noticeable crease and is not as well centered).

For Trade:  T206 Corrected Joe Doyle N.Y.  Hands Above Head, PSA-2 Tolstoi that is Nice-for-Grade and Centered both front & rear!

A unique opportunity to own a Scarce Back Corrected version of "one of the most valuable error cards in the entire hobby ... clearly the toughest to find among the T206 Rarities" (The T206 Collection , Zappala). 

The POP is 2 with only 1 higher.  Only 9 total cards of this Tolstoi version have been graded by PSA, with one of those being a PSA-1 Qualifier.

This will be a nice addition to anyone's Monster Collection, or T206 Sub-set/Run of Rare Backs, Oddities, NY Team etc.

I am looking to trade for any card (or cards) that are at a good value that I can flip easily to pursue PSA HOF examples for my personal collection.  

I was going to collect a T206 Scarce/Rare Back Run, but decided to concentrate on HOF examples from the 1950s or T206 Portraits instead. 

Check your inventory for a trade candidate to acquire this neat card with an interesting Story.

Please Communicate via my email:  [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/GoBigRed/t206/50733/t206-joe-doyle-tolstoi[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/GoBigRed/t206/50734/t206-joe-doyle-tolstoi[/IMG]

Steve .... Lincoln, NE
Bump to Change Trade desire to any HOF T206, not just Portraits.....
